Perceptor:

Perceptor pop up some miles of Predacon's Base, he took his hostage 
and walked towards the bas. Minutes after he was a safe distance. the 
bombs that he planted inside the tunnel exploted and blocke it.

Perceptor came in  the base and he open a com link with Hydras and 
sent the follow message "The hostage and I are inside the base... It 
seems that she's waking up. I'll set her inside a cell or do you that 
she wait you here to said her the welcome"

Nightlight was starting to woke up...
